features: Ergonomic design, adjustable armrests, 180-degree recline, lumbar support, headrest pillow
description: The Delux PRO Series Gaming Chair is designed for ultimate comfort during long gaming sessions. Its ergonomic design ensures proper posture and support. With features like adjustable armrests, a 180-degree recline function, lumbar support, and a headrest pillow, you can game in style and comfort. This chair is built to accommodate gamers of all sizes with a weight capacity of up to 300 lbs.

features: Racecar-style design, adjustable seat height, 180-degree recline, lumbar support, headrest cushion
description: The Delux ThunderX3 TGC22 Gaming Chair offers a racecar-inspired design for gaming enthusiasts. It features adjustable seat height, a 180-degree recline function, lumbar support, and a headrest cushion. This chair is not only comfortable but also stylish, making it a great addition to your gaming setup. It supports gamers up to 250 lbs.

product_name: Delux Elite Series Racing Style Gaming Chair
features: Racing style design, adjustable armrests, 180-degree recline, lumbar support, neck pillow
description: The Delux Elite Series Gaming Chair offers a racing style design for an immersive gaming experience. It includes adjustable armrests, a 180-degree recline feature, lumbar support, and a neck pillow for added comfort during intense gaming sessions. With a weight capacity of up to 275 lbs, this chair is perfect for gamers of various sizes.
